com.etas.jenkins.plugins.CreateTextFile..textFileContent:
FROM centos:latest
RUN yum install -y wget; yum -y clean all RUN yum install -y which; yum -y clean all RUN wget --no-cookies --no-check-certificate --header "Cookie: gpw_e24=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.oracle.com%2F; oraclelicense=accept-securebackup-cookie" "http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u45-b14/jdk-8u45-linux-x64.rpm" RUN rpm -ivh jdk-8u45-linux-x64.rpm RUN rm -rf jdk-8u45-linux-x64.rpm
RUN wget http://central.maven.org/maven2/org/eclipse/jetty/jetty-distribution/9.3.14.v20161028/jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028.tar.gz RUN tar xf jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028.tar.gz RUN rm -rf jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028.tar.gz RUN mv jetty-distribution-9.3.14.v20161028 /opt/jetty/ RUN useradd -m jetty
ADD webapps/ /opt/jetty/webapps RUN chown -R jetty:jetty /opt/jetty/
EXPOSE 8080
ENTRYPOINT /opt/jetty/bin/jetty.sh start && tail -f /opt/jetty/build/logs/symphony-controller.log

######### database ########## database.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver database.url=jdbc:mysql://symphonydtalk.c1aao3ix2plt.eu-central-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/dtalk database.username=root database.password=1qaz2wsx
#########database for MIFE################# #database.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver #database.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:6603/symphony-dialog-prd #database.username=symphony_app #database.password=symphony
######### D-App ########## dapp.default.maxDistance=10000 dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats=^((\\+)?94|0)7[76][0-9]{7}$ dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats.for.signUp =^((\\+)94)7[0125678][0-9]{7}$ dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats.for.like.comment =^((\\+)?94)7[0125678][0-9]{7}$ dapp.allowed.email.formats=^[_A-Za-z0-9-\\+]+(\\.[_A-Za-z0-9-]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9-]+(\\.[A-Za-z0-9]+)*(\\.[A-Za-z]{2,})$ dapp.allowed.msisdn.formats.starPoints=^7[76][0-9]{7}$ dapp.sync.accessToken=e39dc94234beb2e05d5c5e9beb339803 dapp.allowed.pin.format=^[0-9]{6}$ dapp.event.count=10 dapp.app.version.android = 1.2 dapp.app.version.ios = 1.2 dapp.app.type.android = ANDROID dapp.app.type.ios = IOS dapp.download.link = www.dialog.lk/d-app-android / www.dialog.lk/d-app-ios dapp.voucher.maximum.voucher.reserved.time = 180
######### webservice - voucher service ########## voucher.service.appId=1 voucher.service.marshaller.contextPath=com.dialog.vouchers voucher.service.defaultUri=http://dapptest.dialog.lk:8080/axis2/services/VoucherService/
######## apple certificate p12 file ############# certificate.path=/apps/src/services-dialog/modules/src/main/resources/apns-dev-cert.p12 certificate.password=sym.dapp certificate.production=false
######## schedule notification time interval ###### schedule.notification.interval=5
######## CG ###### cg.service.marshaller.contextPath1=types.ws.cg.dialog.lk cg.service.url=http://172.26.1.40:8080/CGWebService cg.connection.timeout=20000 cg.read.timeout=20000 cg.service.appId=VOUCHER2 cg.service.reasonCode=629 cg.service.password=Vouc77Dt cg.service.domainId=GSM
######## DApp Ideabiz token management ########### ideabiz.sms.messaging = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/smsmessaging/v2/outbound/7555/requests ideabiz.sms.subscribe = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/subscription/v1/subscribe ideabiz.sms.root.url = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/token ideabiz.sms.scope = PRODUCTION ideabiz.sms.consumer.key = _keTc1V_nMcrP8BtO1nB84Jviewa ideabiz.sms.consumer.secret = Dlxdk2KaN0mkFOv3T73VMaGnes8a ideabiz.sms.username = axipaynew ideabiz.sms.password = dialog@123 ideabiz.sms.application = Axipay
################# D-Talk FCM message ################## fcm.push.notification.service.url = https://fcm.googleapis.com/fcm/send fcm.push.notification.server.key = AIzaSyB5rUphPsF6NbLU20KlVW_RxYNpAhgFwBw
################# D-talk image url ################### dTalk.image.base.url=/apps/src/web-portal-dialog/public/images/customers/
################## D-Talk wrong attempts ############ dTalk.maximum.wrong.registration.otp.attempts=3 dTalk.maximum.resend.otp=3
################# D_Talk ################## dTalk.sms.gateway=MIFE ## NEXMO/ MIFE
######### Nexmo ######## nexmo.sms.gratway.url=https://rest.nexmo.com/sms/json nexmo.sms.api.key=6a2ebfa9 nexmo.sms.api.secret=7d934548
################ D-Talk data formats ########### dTalk.allowed.first.name.formats = ^[a-zA-z]+([ '-][a-zA-Z]+)*$ dTalk.allowed.password.formats = ^(?=.*?[A-Z])(?=.*?[a-z])(?=.*?[0-9])(?=.*?[#?!@$%^&*-_=]).{6,}$
############## news categories ##################### dTalk.hot.news.derana.rss = http://www.adaderana.lk/rsshotnews.php dTalk.entertainment.news.derana.rss = http://adaderana.lk/rssentertainment.php dTalk.sports.news.derana.rss = http://www.adaderana.lk/rsssports.php
######### D-Talk OCS ########## mife.ocs.username = Ideahub mife.ocs.password = aq1sw2de3! mife.ocs.scope = PRODUCTION mife.ocs.basic = MWlBNl9UZGQwQWNobkgyQm9Zd0FYTHdnUzFRYTo3RXU0bkxGNjFCaWZsXzYyU1ZNWktJSG93Y01h mife.ocs.get.access.token.url = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/token mife.ocs.create.subscriber = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/rcsmanagesubscriber/v1.0/create/ mife.ocs.remove.subscriber = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/rcsmanagesubscriber/remove/ mife.ocs.main.package.change = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/rcsmanagesubscriber/changemainpackage/ mife.ocs.sub.package.change = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/rcsmanagesubscriber/changesubpackage/ mife.ocs.balance.query = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/rcsbalancequery/all/ mife.ocs.account.topup = https://mife.dialog.lk/apicall/rcsmanagesubscriber/ mife.ocs.account.topup.reason.code = 111 mife.ocs.account.remaining.credit.type = 2000 mife.ocs.account.remaining.time.type = 4031
########### Horoscope ############# rumex.horoscope.username = ideahub rumex.horoscope.password = &ja"%@js_4<hd rumex.horoscope.agent.name = RCS rumex.horoscope.mode = RCS client rumex.horoscope.service.id = 1
############ SIP registration ####### dtalk.sip.realm = rcs.mnc002.mcc413.3gppnetwork.org dtalk.sip.password = 12345678 dtalk.sip.pcscfHost = 122.255.0.56 dtalk.sip.pcscfPort = 5070 dtalk.sip.networkTransport = tcp
########### Ideabiz OCS ##########
ideabiz.ocs.username = Dinushika ideabiz.ocs.password = RCS@123dg ideabiz.ocs.scope = SANDBOX ideabiz.ocs.basic = dmVVcVBoVmhKOUpTdG9aeGJEbW53SFpmZHpnYTpmZlN5SkhUbHpVYzBrSGNydUlVMlVpUDZyMm9h ideabiz.ocs.get.access.token.url = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/token ideabiz.ocs.create.subscriber = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/rcs_manage/create/ ideabiz.ocs.balance.query = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/rcs_manage/all/ ideabiz.ocs.account.topup = https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/rcs_manage/ ideabiz.ocs.change.sub.package =https://ideabiz.lk/apicall/rcs_manage/changesubpackage
########### Packages ############ ideabiz.ocs.sub.package1 = 50112 ideabiz.ocs.sub.package2 = 20353 ideabiz.ocs.sub.package3 = 50101 ideabiz.ocs.sub.package4 = 20090 ideabiz.ocs.default.package = 50055 ideabiz.ocs.change.sub.package.operation.id = 1
########### comptel provisioning ########### comptel.provisioning.netype = HLR comptel.provisioning.orderno = 10 comptel.provisioning.req.user = ihc comptel.provisioning.resp.queue.id = RCS comptel.provisioning.create.service = ADD_DTALK comptel.provisioning.delete.service = DEL_DTALK comptel.provisioning.delete.orderno = 20

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf webapps/service.war cp app/controller/build/libs/symphony-controller-2.0-SNAPSHOT.war webapps/service.war sudo docker build -t djetty . sudo docker tag $repo/djetty:latest sudo eval '\$(aws ecr get-login --region us-east-1)' sudo docker push $repo/djetty:latest
